QuestData.Title: Mountain Sounds
QuestData.Description: Kul Tirans won't go down without a fight!$b$bTake this horn. We use it in the mountains to warn each other of danger and lead the charge into battle. Use it to rally our allies against the troggs!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Horn of the Mountain to rally $1oa Kul Tirans.
QuestData.RewardText: Our people defend the estate with renewed vigor!
